pr_title: SONARJAVA-3477 Make S1214 report issues only when interfaces contain only constants

timeline.body:
The official quote is:
> “an interface which contains no methods, it consists solely of **static fields,** each exporting a constant.”

To me, static can be relaxed, and not only static field should be considered.
In any way, we should add a test with different visibility, to show that we considered the case.
